item.title: Journeyful has revamped its website, incorporating additional listings and enhancing rewards
item.description:
Source: Journeyful. The Journeyful 2.0 website. Journeyful, a company located in Singapore, has relaunched an updated website for its rewards-based online travel agency, Journeyful.com. The new and improved “Journeyful 2.0” website features a selection of over 200,000 hotels globally, a price-match guarantee, and Facebook integration. The redesigned website includes Journeyful MICE, which offers comprehensive solutions for business conferences, corporate events, and incentive trips. A Journeyful representative explained that once an online inquiry is submitted, MICE consultants collaborate offline with the organization to personalize solutions...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/journeyful-has-revamped-its-website-incorporating-additional-listings-and-enhancing-rewards/
